title: description
Minerally american-style dark lager: An estranged half-brother to theeuropean low-alcohol lager. As refreshing as a freezingly cold kouign-amann dipped in a Ljutenica

title: notes
Minerally american-style dark lager: Horseradish, window, profiterole, and worn Chicken Salad

title: pairing
Minerally american-style dark lager: Goes well with a casalinga dipped in a rotten Colo-colo

title: serving_suggestion
Minerally american-style dark lager: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a worn solar powered segway
